post_content_localized.en:
Whether dad likes a day on the water, a cold brew in his hand, or both — there are many ways to plan the perfect Father’s Day in NYC.

Treat Dad to a Brew-haha at these Fabulous Breweries in NYC

It wouldn’t be summer in NYC without a cold one on a hot afternoon. Take dad to one of the craft breweries located throughout the city and treat him to a genuine NYC brew.

Breweries located everywhere from the Bronx to Long Island are serving up ales, stouts, lagers, and more to keep dad happy on his special day.

Celebrate Father’s Day in NYC by Hangin’ on the Hudson

Bet you never thought of New York as a kayaking destination. Yet kayaking in NYC is as common as, well, breweries! With three convenient locations at Piers 26, 84, and 96, dad can take a kayak trip along the Hudson and enjoy the New York skyline at the same time. Lessons are available, so don’t be afraid to get out and enjoy the sun and water while bonding with dad.

Afterwards, visit a local restaurant like Keen’s Steakhouse or the Minetta Tavern to treat dad to a real, New York-style meal.

Do Summer in NYC and Father’s Day Right at The Manhattan Club

The midtown Manhattan location of The Manhattan Club makes exploring the Hudson and stopping for a brew and bite to eat easy and fun. Plus, we have the amenities to help you feel at home while you celebrate fun, sun, and family in the Big Apple this Father’s Day.
